comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
Do a document submit for a xml file (CDA_R2) which is more than 213KB.

More information:
I am trying to submit a large CDA_R2(xml)Document using Document source OHF API. 
It seems there is a problem in axis2-saaj-1.1.1.jar.
A method in SAAJDataSource.flushToDisk() trys to create a temporary file (temp) when the size of document is beyond some limit and it fails.

"java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Illegal Argument"
